title: Information System Design for Deep Learning Based Plant Counting Automation
venue: 2018 Indonesian Association for Pattern Recognition International Conference (INAPR)

abstract: Precision agriculture (PA) has been known for its capability in improving farm productivity. For instance, one of the cases in PA, automated plant counting, is able to accelerate the process of plantation monitoring. Despite many previous researches have developed information system for PA, there is no system which can be used for plant counting automation. Therefore, in this paper, we introduce an information system design that is crafted for automated plant counting. We show that the system design is capable to be integrated with Deep Learning, a state-of-the-art technique in many Artificial Intelligence task.
